title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP and the guys discuss game 1 of the Western Conference Finals. Why wasn't Luka able to get going? Pat Forde calls in to discuss Nick Saban's Jimbo Fisher Comments. And DP reacts to Jimbo's press conference going scorched earth on Saban in his afternoon press conference.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
